name: Astro Inventors
description:
This is currently in closed alpha.

(most of) The screenshots are from a old version, I have done a rewrite since, the game is way more stable + some core code fixes, right now I do not have all the blocks re-implemented

A game about living, exploring, building in a vast (currently 2 really close planets... but soon to be expanded) universe.

Please comment bugs on my Discord server

https://discord.gg/4udEs8f
